short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered interactive walkthroughs for any leetcode problem

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Marble adds an AI-powered tutor on top of leetcode for any problem in any language.

The tutor allows for interactive walkthroughs which promote a deep understanding of leetcode patterns.

**The walkthroughs involve**:

1. Understanding the problem
2. Creating a plan
3. Implementing the plan by coding it

This process is very similar to what technical interviewers want to see in your thinking process.

- - - - -
How does it work?
Open a leetcode problem, then click on the circle pin to start the interactive walkthrough.

Email me with any questions or feedback: miguel@opencode.so
